name: University Management Server — Backend API
details: A comprehensive backend API for managing university operations, including user roles (Admin, Student,Faculty), academic semesters, faculties, departments, course offerings, and semester registrations.The system ensures validation and error handling using Zod and custom middleware,integrated MongoDB transactions, role-based access, and conflict-free course scheduling.
tech: TypeScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose ODM, Zod, Dotenv, ESLint, Prettier

name: Product-Order Management — Backend API
details: A RESTful backend API built for managing products and orders, including product creation, order placement, and inventory updates, used Zod for input validation and structured error handling, managed database interactions with Mongoose ODM and designed with a clean and scalable folder structure.
tech: TypeScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose ODM, Zod, Dotenv

name: SpeakHour — Full-Stack Language Learning Platform
details: SpeakHour is a frontend-only web application designed as a prototype for a foreign language learning platform and implemented user authentication using Firebase (email/password login), integrated with JWT-based session management
tech: ReactJS,ExpressJS, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Firebase, JWT, TanStack Query

name: Turkish Dinner — Chef Recipe Showcase Web App
details: TurkishDinner is a single-page web application that displays a list of chefs from a Turkish restaurant, allowing users to explore their recipes and detailed menus.
tech: ReactJS,ExpressJS,MongoDB, Bootstrap, React Router DOM, Firebase

name: WeKiddies — Toy Marketplace Web Application
details: WeKiddies is a full-stack toy marketplace web application where users can browse, add, and manage toy listings with an intuitive and interactive interface.
tech: ReactJS,ExpressJS, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, Swiper.js, SweetAlert2

name: Knowledge Cafe —  A single-page React application
details: Knowledge Cafe is a single page react application where users can see blogs related card , can bookmarked blogs,see reading time statically, read some react related questions and answers .

name: Career Hub
details: Career hub is a single page react application where users can see some job category lists, dynamic features jobs, statistics for job categories, read some react related questions and answers using blog pages.

name: Ai Universe Hub
details: Ai Universe Hub is a simple responsive web application using html, css, bootstrap, javascript where users see some card and its details.I applied here async await function for json data.

name: Geometry Genius
details: Geometry Genius is a simple responsive web application using html, css, tailwind, javascript where users can calculate some geometry and show it in the sidebar.I applied here dom for creating the website.
